trans-unit.source: Represents a class that maintains a set of context items published into the designer editing context.
trans-unit.target: 表示要維護一組內容項目發行到設計工具的編輯內容的類別。

trans-unit.source: This class is abstract.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別是抽象的。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem> contained in the ContextItemManager represents a piece of transient state in a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem>包含在 ContextItemManager 代表一段暫時性狀態<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner>。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem>

trans-unit.source: Initiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 起始的新執行個體<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a value that indicates whether the item manager contains an item of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回值，指出項目管理員是否包含指定之型別的項目。

trans-unit.source: The type of item to check for.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the context contains an instance of the specified item type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果內容包含將指定的項目類型的執行個體否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: itemType is .
trans-unit.target: itemTypeis .

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, enumerates the context items in the editing context.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會列舉編輯內容中的內容項目。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration includes prior layers unless the enumerator hits an isolated layer.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉會包含先前的層級，除非列舉達到隔離的層。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601>, which contains an enumeration of context items.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601>，其中包含項目內容的列舉。

trans-unit.source: Represents a helper method that returns the target object for a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 代表傳回委派的目標物件的 helper 方法。

trans-unit.source: If the delegate was created to proxy a generic delegate, this method returns the original object, not the proxy.
trans-unit.target: 委派建立，proxy 的泛型委派，這個方法會傳回原始物件，而非 proxy。

trans-unit.source: The callback for the desired target.
trans-unit.target: 所要的目標回呼。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Object>, which contains the target object of the callback.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Object>，其中包含回呼的目標物件。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: callback is .
trans-unit.target: callbackis .

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns an instance of the requested item type.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回要求的項目類型的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If there is no context item with the given type, an empty item will be created.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有指定型別的內容項目，就會建立空的項目。

trans-unit.source: The type of item to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"></xref>, which contains a context item of the requested type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"> </xref>，其中包含所要求型別的內容項目。

trans-unit.source: If there is no item in the context for this type, a default one is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果此型別的內容中沒有任何項目，預設會建立一個。

trans-unit.source: itemType is .
trans-unit.target: itemTypeis .

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Represents a helper method that invokes the protected <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem.OnItemChanged*> method.
trans-unit.target: 代表 helper 方法，會叫用受保護<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem.OnItemChanged*>方法。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem.OnItemChanged*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"></xref> in use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"></xref> in use.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The previous <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 先前<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: context, item, or previousItem is .
trans-unit.target: context, item, or previousItem is .

trans-unit.source: Represents a helper method that performs delegate removals and that unwraps delegates that are proxies to generic callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 代表 helper 方法會執行委派移除，並可解除包裝泛型回呼 proxy 的委派。

trans-unit.source: Use this method in your implementations of the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager.Unsubscribe%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在您的實作中使用這個方法<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager.Unsubscribe%2A>方法。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager.Unsubscribe%2A>

trans-unit.source: The existing delegate.
trans-unit.target: 現有的委派。

trans-unit.source: The delegate to be removed from `existing`.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的委派`existing`。

trans-unit.source: Returns , which contains the new delegate that should be assigned to existing.
trans-unit.target: 傳回，其中包含應指派給新委派 existing 。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, adds an event callback that is invoked when a context item of the specified item type changes.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫，將指定的項目類型變更的內容項目時叫用的事件回呼。

trans-unit.source: The type of item you want to subscribe to.
trans-unit.target: 您想要訂閱的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback"></xref> that is invoked when `contextItemType` changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback"> </xref>也就是說時叫用`contextItemType`變更。

trans-unit.source: contextItemType or callback is .
trans-unit.target: contextItemTypeor callback is .

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Enumerates the context items in the editing context.
trans-unit.target: 列舉編輯內容中的內容項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, removes a subscription.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會移除訂用帳戶。

trans-unit.source: The type of context item to remove the callback from.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中移除回呼的內容項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback"> </xref>移除。

trans-unit.source: callback is .
trans-unit.target: callbackis .

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
